attributes.action: MP's to give their 2020 £2,505 Pay increase back to the NHS. - CAPTAIN TOM!
attributes.additional_details: If every MP (around 600) decided to put that £2505 into Captain Tom's charity that would give an additional £1,503,000 to the charity - the British public have so far donated £7,651,301. We could get that total to 10M for all the HEROS!
attributes.background: The MPs blocked a pay increase to NHS workers - They are on the frontline doing a awesome job at the moment!! They should feel ashamed they took that pay increase when so many are struggling.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions on charitable donations are for individual MPs, not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.

We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
